title: Partition Wizard Pro & Server Edition 9.1 Incl.Keygen-SND
description:
MiniTool Partition Wizard Pro & Server Edition 9.1





MiniTool Partition Wizard Professional Edition is a professional partition manager which is developed aiming at Windows PC. It owns comprehensive partition management functions, like Merge Partition, Move/Resize Partition, Copy Partition, Create Partition, Split Partition, Delete Partition, Format Partition, and Convert File System.

Partition management
- Extend partition: increase partition capacity without damaging data.
- Merge 2 neighboring partitions without bringing any damage to data.
- Interconvert disk between dynamic disk and basic disk and interconvert file system between FAT and NTFS perfectly.
- Set partition label: users can add annotation for partition according to actual needs.
- Help users convert MBR disk to GPT disk so as to make better use of disk space.
- Help users check the completeness of file system at any time. Once problem emerges, it can help fix it.
- Help change partition cluster size without exerting any influence on data.

Copy wizard
- Copy partition as well as data stored on the partition quickly so as to protect data.
- Copy the whole disk to non-system disk so as to avoid reinstalling operating system.
- Copy dynamic volume to basic disk safely.

Partition recovery
- Recover partition which is lost due to personal mistake, software error, virus attack, and other factors.
- Support recovering partitions with different kinds of file systems like FAT and NTFS.

Dynamic disk
- Can help users create volume and move volume.
- Help users explore detailed properties of a volume.
- Help format volume.



What's new in MiniTool Partition Wizard 9:

New Functions:
- Migrate OS to SSD/HD without cloning the entire disk
- Perfectly support Storage Spaces in Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
- Add detailed operating logs
- Update device information once it is connected

Improvements on Old Functions:
- Unhide partition and Appoint drive letter in one go
- Merge partitions much more easily and safely
- Convert dynamic disk to basic disk more easily
- Be able to resize partitions when copying disk
- The bootable edition of MiniTool Partition Wizard support boot from UEFI



win10 ready

Installation:

Unpack and install
Use keygen to register
